yourModID:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend

yourModID:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

yourModID:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !yourModID:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

yourModID:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
